#summary Information about System Distributions

=== System Distribution December 02, 2007 (8.0.1202) ===

Major Changes:
  * New modules: hackystat-sensor-vim, hackystat-ui-projectviewer, hackystat-ui-telemetryviewer
  * Substantial changes to !SensorShell API.
  * Backward-incompatible change: instead of .hackystat/v8.sensor.properties, users must now create .hackystat/sensorshell/sensorshell.properties


=== System Distribution November 15, 2007 (8.0.1015) ===

Major Changes:
  * New Module: !StackyHack, illustrating use of Sensors. 
  * Improvements to Coverage and !CodeIssue SDTs ("One Sensor Data Instance Per File").
  * Improvements to SDV and SDB (internal performance stuff)
  * Misc internal improvements to Utilities, !SensorBase, !DailyProjectData, Telemetry.


=== System Distribution October 8, 2007 (8.0.1008) ===

Major changes:
  * !DailyProjectData module added.


=== System Distribution October 6, 2007 (8.0.1006) ===

Major changes:
  * Initial release of system distributions.
